title: The Secret Beneath Engelsburg
description: Simon Booker is a young Religious Studies student at the prestigious Engelsburg University; a handsome institute located near the coast. There, he meets the charming Asce Linden and the thoughtful Professor Jules Curwin â€“ and unwittingly discovers an ancient horror lurking under his feet. It looms at the edge of his dreams, its static song calling...For him. (Free gay tentacle erotica.)
author: Weoulf Dietrich
